text: The Serpent's Egg is a 1977 German American Swedish drama movie directed by Ingmar Bergman and starring Liv Ullmann, David Carradine, Gert Fr√∂be, Heinz Bennett, James Whitmore, Glynn Turman, Grischa Huber, Lisi Mangold, Hans Quest. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ingmar Bergman
